CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: This is a polymer material, specifically a poly(3,6-di(thiophene-2-yl)-thieno[3,2-b]thiophene) derivative, which is used as the semiconducting layer in the fabrication of the top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs).

2. PCDSeBT: This is another polymer material, a poly(3,6-di(selenophene-2-yl)-thieno[3,2-b]thiophene) derivative, which is also used as the semiconducting layer in the fabrication of the top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs).

3. Octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS): This is a self-assembled monolayer (SAM) material used to modify the Si/SiO2 substrates in the fabrication of the top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs).

4. Si/SiO2 substrates: These are the substrate materials used in the fabrication of the top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs). Si is silicon, and SiO2 is silicon dioxide.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PCDTBT
2. PCDSeBT
3. Octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph that are relevant to the context of the question.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Heteroatom substitution: This is a process or treatment that involves replacing one or more atoms in a molecule with another atom or group of atoms. In this context, it refers to the substitution of atoms in the polymers.
2. Charge transporting properties: This refers to the ability of a material to conduct an electric charge. In this context, it refers to the ability of the polymers to transport charges in the OFETs.
3. Top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs): These are a type of transistor where the gate electrode is on top of the semiconducting layer.
4. Solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT: These are polymers that have been processed using a solution method. PCDTBT and PCDSeBT are specific types of polymers.
5. Octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS): This is a self-assembled monolayer (SAM) modifier. It is a type of organic compound.
6. Si / SiO2 substrates: These are substrates made of silicon and silicon dioxide.
7. Detailed devices fabrication: This refers to the process of making the OFETs, specifically the fabrication details.

Therefore, the property value entities in the paragraph are:

1. Charge transporting properties of the polymers
2. Ability of the polymers to transport charges in the OFETs.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Charge transporting properties of the polymers
2. Ability of the polymers to transport charges in the OFETs.

These entities clearly refer to the value of material properties, specifically the electrical conductivity or charge transport ability of the polymers in the context of the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Charge transporting properties of the polymers |
| Ability of the polymers to transport charges in the OFETs |
